parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft pulley bolt can cause the pulley to detach, leading to a loss of power steering, overheating, and engine damage, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft pulley bolt can cause loss of power steering, loss of control, and accidents, which can lead to injuries and fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering box can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, which can lead to fatalities.
symptoms: Large amount of play in the steering wheel

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the pitman arm can cause loss of steering control, accidents, and injuries, which can lead to fatalities.
The failure of the inner tie rod can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, which can lead to fatalities.
The failure of the power steering can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, which can lead to fatalities.
The vehicle drifting or wandering can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, which can lead to fatalities.
symptoms: Vehicle wanders or drifts on the road

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Wheel Lockup and Loss of Control
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden lockup of the rear wheels can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: and may flip or roll over.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Dry Rot and Potential Blowout
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Dry rot on the tires can cause a blowout, leading to loss of control and accidents.
symptoms: Dry rot near the hub cap

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Failure and Loss of Control
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake pedal hardness and lockup can cause the vehicle to slow down or lose control, leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: and vehicle slows down or loses control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: ABS Malfunction and Premature Brake Wear
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: ABS malfunction can cause accidents and injuries, while premature brake wear can lead to brake failure.
